meanings.definition: Offered to do something without being forced
meanings.sent1: The kind students volunteered to clean up the playground after school.
meanings.sent2: The volunteered team of helpers made the event run smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The volunteered helpers were like cheerful elves spreading joy.
meanings.sent4: Her volunteered effort was a shining example of selflessness.
meanings.sent5: The volunteered workers were like bright stars in the community.

meanings.definition: Gave help or offered services willingly
meanings.sent1: She volunteered at the animal shelter every weekend.
meanings.sent2: He volunteered to assist his elderly neighbor with yard work.
meanings.sent3: The cat volunteered to chase away the pesky birds from the garden.
meanings.sent4: The sun volunteered to light up the world each day.
meanings.sent5: The flowers volunteered their beauty to brighten up the room.
